item.title: Create marketing videos - Upwork
item.description:

item.title: Drone Pilot - Benton Harbor, Michigan - Upwork
item.description:
I'm in need of a licensed Part 107 drone pilot who can capture video in Benton Harbor, Michigan. Looking for 3-5 solid shots of an exterior of a building. No editing or color correction, deliverables would be the source/raw files in whatever format your drone.

We are filming with the client on June 26th in the morning, so ideally you could also film that morning while we are there, but we have some flexibility in capturing the exterior shot.

Please include examples of your work!

Thanks,

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 17, 2024 14:37 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Drone, Videography
Skills: Drone, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
